item.title: What To Do This Weekend 22.05.25
item.summary: Looking for things to do this weekend? Look no further – from stylish pop-ups to foodie collabs and family-friendly fun, our guide has options for everyone…

div.class: section-margin-normal vertical-align-middle section-width-narrow tw-mb-20 tw-items-center tw-container md:tw-max-w-lg lg:tw-max-w-2xl xl:tw-max-w-3xl layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
It’s London’s first serious festival weekend of the year. A host of one-dayers are taking over Brockwell Park – Field Day has relocated there from Victoria Park this year, or you could try Cross the Tracks for something a bit funkier on Sunday – but we’re shining a light on Gala in Peckham Rye Park. For its tenth birthday, it’s landed a live performance from Caribou and a DJ set from Floating Points. A couple of big names from Detroit, Theo Parrish and Moodymann, will also be helping it celebrate. Day tickets start from £39.50 plus booking fee.
Peckham Rye Park, Straker's Road, Peckham Rye, SE15 3UA; 23rd-25th May
Visit THISISGALA.CO.UK

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
A couple of proper players on the east London cocktail scene have teamed up to open Parasol in Dalston. In the basement that used to be The Nest club, Andy Kerr (Sun Tavern, Umbrella Project) and Tom Gibson (Ruby’s, Corrochio’s) have created a warm space inspired by trips to Mexico and Morocco. Signature serves include the June Bug (Takamaka overproof rum, pineapple, banana) and the smoky El Diablo Guapo (Quiquiriqui mezcal, palo santo, blackberry). There are low-intervention wines from Provisions Wine & Cheese, and the new place is open to 2am Wednesday to Saturday, fuelled by DJs spinning classic NYC-style mutant disco.
36 Stoke Newington Road, Dalston, N16 7XJ
Visit PARASOL-LONDON.CO.UK

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
Heads up. It’s only a couple of weeks until Chestertons Polo in the Park lands in London for its 2025 edition. It’s taking over handsome Hurlingham Park for three days – and each day offers something slightly different. Friday 6th June is built around the big game: an international match between England and Argentina. Saturday is Ladies Day, then Sunday is dedicated to families, before the music’s turned up from 2pm for the now classic Polo Day Party. On all three days, anyone looking to cut loose should be eyeing up CALA – the pitchside VIP area where champagne, Pimm’s and cocktails flow freely at private bars and via direct table service.
Hurlingham Park, Fulham, SW6 3RH; 6th-8th June
Visit POLOINTHEPARKLONDON.COM

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
Opening this week at the Barbican, Feel The Sound is an exhibition that takes music beyond the auditory and into multi-sensory territory. Dotted around the arts hub, it comprises 11 interactive installations that use new tech and original artwork to show how sound can impact our bodies and how we feel. There’s even a chance to feel music without any sound – and don’t miss the Joyride installation out in the car park, which channels the heady days of boy racers and Y2K raves.
Silk Street, Barbican, EC2Y 8DS; opens 22nd May
Visit BARBICAN.ORG.UK

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
Quality Wines – neighbour and sister to the ever-outstanding Quality Chop House – is starting a Sunday Series. The Farringdon spot didn’t used to open on the sabbath, but every month or so it will now be hosting guest chefs in its kitchen. Cooks from Chishiru, Mangal II and Tiella are all booked in, starting with Decatur pan rattler Tom Zahir this Sunday 25th May. Count on him for up to eight dishes with a southern US bent – and, of course, there’ll be a few decent drops to pair with his flexible menu.
88 Farringdon Road, Farringdon, EC1R 3EA
Visit QUALITYWINESFARRINGDON.COM

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Brazilian brand Farm Rio has touched down at Selfridges. And this isn’t just a new brand launch; it’s an experience. The third floor has been transformed into a colourful jungle-meets-gallery space in collaboration with design studio Estúdio Campana. Expect exclusive drops from Farm Rio’s summer ’25 collection, vibrant prints, and plenty of photo-worthy corners. Inspired by the theme ‘Living Nature’, the pop-up is a celebration of Brazilian culture and sustainability – and a fresh update for your holiday wardrobe.

div.div: Farm Rio At Selfridges / Michael Franke

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
div.h2: FOR FILLING YOUR LIFE WITH FLOWERS:

div.class: tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
div.h3: Skye McAlpine x Tavola’s Spring Shop

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
Belgravia is in bloom. Open until 7th June, Tavola’s dreamy Spring Shop is putting on a series of creative workshops hosted by Skye McAlpine. Expect floral tablescaping sessions with Minnow and Wolf, paint-your-own menu card classes with Imogen Partridge, and dried flower arranging with Design by Nature. Each workshop blends Skye’s signature romantic style with seasonal blooms and relaxed elegance – and it’s the perfect excuse to gather the girls.
48 Elizabeth Street, Belgravia, SW1W 9PA
Visit SKYEMCALPINETAVOLA.COM

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: For one day only, Lisbon’s hottest chef is in London. Tasca’s Josh Dallaway and Sílvia Rocha from BLOCO are joining forces on Sunday 25th May for a special collab at Cav in Bethnal Green. Expect new twists on comforting Portuguese dishes – like octopus salad, cheesy blood rice arancini, and roast lamb bacalhau à Brás. The wine list is fully Portuguese (including litre bottles of chilled Nat Cool reds) and the vibes are intimate and relaxed. Booking is essential.

p.em: 378 Cambridge Heath Road, Bethnal Green, E2 9RA

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Claridge’s is celebrating the 100th anniversary of Art Deco with a year-long tribute to the Roaring Twenties. The Bright Young Things series includes Gatsby-style dinners, Lalique-glass cocktails in the Fumoir, and Charleston masterclasses from London’s best flappers. There are also deco-themed sleepovers, behind-the-scenes hotel tours, and talks from vintage experts. Expect plenty of champagne, rare archival pieces and a touch of 1920s magic – Claridge’s style.

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
div.h3: Sunday Kids' Corner at The Londoner

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Heading out for lunch with the kids this half term? The Londoner has you covered. Each Sunday until 15th June, diners at Whitcomb’s can enjoy their meal while little ones (aged 3+) get stuck into crafts, games and table-top activities at the complimentary Kids’ Corner. It runs from 12.30pm to 4.30pm, supervised by DBS-checked playworkers from The Kids’ Table – ideal for parents who want a proper meal without the faff.

p.em: Whitcomb’s at The Londoner, 38 Leicester Square, West End, WC2H 7DX

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Regent’s Park Open Air Theatre kicks off its summer season with a day dedicated to families on Sunday 25th May. Expect a flute-filled Bach to Baby concert in the morning; a kid-friendly comedy club (think stand-up minus the rude bits) at 11.30am; and Fly-Kid – a hip-hop party for parents and kids – from lunchtime onwards. To round off the Family Takeover Day, there will be a star-studded night of poetry and performance featuring Damian Lewis, Tony Robinson, Olivia Williams, Indira Varma, James Phoon and Samantha Spiro reading some of Shakespeare’s most-loved speeches and sonnets.

p.em: Regent’s Park Open Air Theatre, Regent’s Park, NW1 4N

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: One of London’s chicest outdoor dining spots is back. Hyde Park Garden at the Mandarin Oriental has reopened for summer – and this year, it’s all about elevated British classics, courtesy of Dinner by Heston Blumenthal. In the hotel’s private garden, with first-rate views across Hyde Park, the pop-up’s menu will include Heston’s famous triple-cooked chips and reimagined ‘Chips and Fish’, served on custom newspaper. Add signature dishes like the famous meat fruit and tipsy cake, and you’ve got one of the most luxe lunch spots in the city. Drinks? A Château d’Esclans wine list – featuring Whispering Angel and Garrus – brings a splash of Provence to the table. Open daily for long lunches and golden-hour rosé, this is your go-to for summer dining with serious style.

p.em: Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, Knightsbridge, SW1X 7LA

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
Illustrator and designer Pip Carter – known for her work with Charlotte Tilbury and Vanity Fair – unveils her first solo exhibition Somewhere In The Nowhere this month at Shreeji newsagents on Chiltern Street. Created in partnership with Air Mail and cult flower delivery brand Freddie’s Flowers, the show features Pip’s large-scale abstract florals, layered with a surreal installation of real blooms suspended in front of the canvases. Think dreamlike cosmic diptychs filled with poppies and irises, where Matisse-style paper cut-outs collide with living plants. With a limited-edition run of silkscreen prints available post show, this two-day-only event promises to be as photogenic as it is immersive.
6 Chiltern Street, Marylebone, W1U 7PT; 28th-29th May
Visit SHREEJINEWSAGENTS.COM

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
For something a little different, Birkenstock has teamed up with natural nail studio Still London to launch a serene series of foot spa treatments at its Shoreditch studio. Inspired by its SS25 Florida collection, the immersive experience includes the brand’s signature foot massage and bespoke pedicures using Birkenstock’s Care Essentials range. Add a custom soundtrack by Alex Hislop and you’ve got the ultimate after-work unwind. Treatments are available Wednesday to Friday – but appointments are limited, so book ahead.
Birkenstock Studio, Dray Walk, The Old Truman Brewery, Brick Lane, E1 6QL; until 6th June
Visit BIRKENSTOCK.COM

img.alt: Fritton Lake

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p:
For a countryside getaway with serious foodie credentials, FieldGoods is taking over Fritton Lake for a limited series of stay-and-dine weekends. Usually reserved for members and cabin owners, the exclusive estate is opening its gates for a seasonal lunch hosted by FieldGoods founders Elliot and Sam, alongside Fritton’s chefs. Expect a hyper-local menu made with produce from the estate’s regenerative farm and local suppliers – served alongside wild swimming, a floating sauna, heated pool, tennis courts and a sustainable gym. Choose from a one-night clubhouse stay or a two-night cottage escape, with packages starting from £250 for two.
Fritton Lake, Fritton, Norfolk, NR31 9HA; 4th-6th June
Visit FRITTONLAKE.CO.UK

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-font-light tw-font-serif tw-italic tw-leading-[1.1] tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Following its success last year, the Coravin World Wine Tour is back. The maker of the revolutionary wine-by-the-glass system has created another celebration that will see select restaurants offering an exclusive Coravin wine list, spotlighting rare and iconic wines not typically available by the glass. As well as popping up at the likes of Thomas in Cardiff, Climat in Manchester and Lapin in Bristol, the tour returns to the capital, where some exciting wines will be served at Jackson Boxer’s Brunswick House and his newcomer Dove, as well as Petrus by Gordon Ramsay and Bacchanalia. We imagine a glass of 2016 Roagna Barbaresco Albesani will pair perfectly with one of Dove’s off-menu gorgonzola burgers…

item.title: A Make-Up Artist Chooses Her Favourite Pick-Me-Ups
item.summary: There’s no denying the power of make-up to lift your mood. We asked pro artist Cher Webb about the products she turns to for an instant boost…

div.class: section-margin-normal vertical-align-top section-width-normal tw-mb-20 tw-items-top tw-container layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
field__items tw-divide-y tw-divide-solid tw-divide-grey-light md:tw-max-w-lg tw-mx-auto lg:tw-max-w-none

div.h4: Skin Nova Radiant Makeup Primer, £31 | Vieve

div.class: tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: This multi-tasking primer layers well both under and over make-up – it’s the perfect glowy base. Full of skin-loving ingredients, it hydrates, brightens and illuminates, and can be used in a few different ways. I love mixing a drop into my foundation or pressing it over the high points of my face. It's an amazing all-rounder and a staple in my beauty routine.

div.class: field__items tw-divide-y tw-divide-solid tw-divide-grey-light md:tw-max-w-lg tw-mx-auto lg:tw-max-w-none
tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-items-center tw-justify-center tw-overflow-hidden tw-space-y-16 lg:tw-items-start lg:tw-space-y-0 lg:tw-flex-row lg:tw--mx-24 xl:tw--mx-28
field__item tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-w-full tw-items-center md:tw-max-w-md tw-text-center lg:tw-max-w-xl lg:tw-py-0 lg:tw-px-24 xl:tw-max-w-3xl xl:tw-px-28 field__item__modulo_1
tw-lining-nums tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-mt-1 tw-text-2xs sm:tw-text-xs tw-tracking-widest tw-uppercase field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: Natasha Denona’s Glam Palette is a best-seller for a reason. Its beautiful mix of luminous shades, metallics and matte textures make for endless possibilities.. It’s a staple in my kit as well as in my personal make-up bag. Its shades are flattering and wearable – there’s a combination to suit every eye colour and skin tone.

div.class: field__item tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-w-full tw-items-center md:tw-max-w-md tw-text-center lg:tw-max-w-xl lg:tw-py-0 lg:tw-px-24 xl:tw-max-w-3xl xl:tw-px-28 field__item__modulo_2 tw-border-t tw-pt-16 lg:tw-border-l tw-border-grey-light lg:tw-border-t-0
tw-lining-nums tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-mt-1 tw-text-2xs sm:tw-text-xs tw-tracking-widest tw-uppercase field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
div.h4: Les Beiges Healthy Glow Bronzing Cream, £50 | Chanel

div.class: tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: Bronzer always makes me feel good, and brings my skin to life with a single swipe. This Chanel formula has been in my kit for years – I love how it creates a sun-kissed glow but with a velvety, soft-focus finish that lasts. The texture is unique, and the pot lasts a really long time.

div.class: two-column tw-pt-12 md:tw-pt-20 xl:tw-pt-20 tw-border-t tw-border-grey tw-overflow-hidden
tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-items-center tw-justify-center tw-overflow-hidden tw-space-y-16 lg:tw-items-start lg:tw-space-y-0 lg:tw-flex-row lg:tw--mx-24 xl:tw--mx-28
field__item tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-w-full tw-items-center md:tw-max-w-md tw-text-center lg:tw-max-w-xl lg:tw-py-0 lg:tw-px-24 xl:tw-max-w-3xl xl:tw-px-28 field__item__modulo_3
tw-lining-nums tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-mt-1 tw-text-2xs sm:tw-text-xs tw-tracking-widest tw-uppercase field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: Mascara is one of my favourite make-up products for enhancing and transforming a look in seconds. I always feel more put-together when I’m wearing it. I’ve used Clinique High Impact Mascara since my teens – my mum got me into this in the early 90s! The burgundy version is a great alternative if you’re after something a little softer.

div.class: field__items tw-divide-y tw-divide-solid tw-divide-grey-light md:tw-max-w-lg tw-mx-auto lg:tw-max-w-none
tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-items-center tw-justify-center tw-overflow-hidden tw-space-y-16 lg:tw-items-start lg:tw-space-y-0 lg:tw-flex-row lg:tw--mx-24 xl:tw--mx-28
field__item tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-w-full tw-items-center md:tw-max-w-md tw-text-center lg:tw-max-w-xl lg:tw-py-0 lg:tw-px-24 xl:tw-max-w-3xl xl:tw-px-28 field__item__modulo_1
tw-lining-nums tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-mt-1 tw-text-2xs sm:tw-text-xs tw-tracking-widest tw-uppercase field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: One lipstick shade I buy on repeat is ‘Pout’ by Victoria Beckham Beauty. It’s an amplified version of my natural lip colour, with a satin texture that glides on. I love how versatile it is for every kind of look, whether you’re wearing very minimal make-up or a full smokey eye. Plus, it’s lovely dabbed on the apples of the cheeks.

div.class: field__item tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-w-full tw-items-center md:tw-max-w-md tw-text-center lg:tw-max-w-xl lg:tw-py-0 lg:tw-px-24 xl:tw-max-w-3xl xl:tw-px-28 field__item__modulo_2 tw-border-t tw-pt-16 lg:tw-border-l tw-border-grey-light lg:tw-border-t-0
tw-lining-nums tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-mt-1 tw-text-2xs sm:tw-text-xs tw-tracking-widest tw-uppercase field field--name-field-subtitle field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: Lash curlers never fail to impress. The instant lift makes such a difference, especially first thing in the morning. It’s a step that’s often skipped, but it’s the secret to looking wide awake. Investing in a quality tool and ensuring the rubber pads are replaced regularly will guarantee the best results. Shiseido’s version is my favourite as the design works for every eye shape.

div.h4: Seamless Skin Enhancing Tint, £37 | Lisa Eldridge Beauty

div.class: tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: Every day feels like a good skin day when I use this skin tint. The effect is so natural looking and it offers just the right amount of coverage to reduce redness and even out your complexion. It also comes in a handy, compact size – ideal for your make-up bag.

tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: This is a mini make-up kit in one sleek compact. I can do a full skin and eye look with it. The powders are so finely milled, they bring skin to life without looking like make-up – just a soft, diffused glow. Perfect for on the go, and it lasts forever.

div.h4: Soft Pinch Liquid Blush, £24 | Rare Beauty

div.class: tw-prose tw-max-w-none clearfix text-formatted field field--name-field-body field--type-text-long field--label-hidden field__item
div.p: Blush instantly perks up and lifts the complexion, adding colour and glow. Rare Beauty’s Soft Pinch Liquid Blush blends like a dream for a fresh, healthy flush – ‘Happy’ and ‘Joy’ are my favourites. If you’re after a matte finish, the new Soft Pinch Matte Bouncy Blush is just as effortless, gliding on beautifully with brushes or fingertips.

div.p: A bold lip always lifts my mood, and M·A·C’s ‘Lady Danger’ is the ultimate feel-good shade. The vibrant orange-red is iconic, and I love wearing it with minimal make-up for an uplifting pop of colour.

item.title: Your New Daily Ritual For Energy, Focus & Craving Control
item.partnership: Created in partnership with GP NUTRITION
item.summary: Metabolism isn’t just about how quickly you burn calories – it plays a role in everything from your energy levels and hormones to how efficiently your body uses food as fuel. If you often feel flat, foggy or reliant on caffeine to get you through the day, your metabolic health might need a reset. That’s where MetaboliseMe comes in. The latest launch from GP Nutrition, it’s a smarter way to support your metabolism, using science-backed nutrients to enhance energy, regulate cravings and promote balance from within. Here’s what you need to know…

div.class: layout layout--twocol-section layout--twocol-section--50-50 section-margin-wide sticky-region-right vertical-align-top section-width-normal sheerluxe-grid-gap--x sheerluxe-grid-gap--y tw-mb-20 lg:tw-mb-28 tw-items-top tw-container tw-grid md:tw-grid-cols-12
tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: GP Nutrition was founded by renowned nutritionist Gabriela Peacock, whose balanced, science-led approach to wellness has made the brand a go-to for high-quality, effective supplements. Through years of working with clients – from time-poor professionals to high-profile individuals – Gabriela saw a clear pattern. People wanted more energy, sharper focus and sustainable support for weight management, without punishing themselves with crash diets. MetaboliseMe was born out of that insight – an intelligent, body-friendly supplement designed to gently optimise your metabolism and support lasting wellbeing.

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockquote tw-flex tw-flex-col tw-items-start tw-pl-3

field__item tw-inline-block tw-relative tw-text-left before:tw-content-[open-quote] before:tw--mr-1.5 after:tw-content-[close-quote] after:tw--ml-2 tw-font-light tw-font-ivar-fine tw-italic tw-leading-tight tw-text-3xl md:tw-text-4xl xl:tw-text-5.5xl before:tw-absolute before:tw--left-3 md:before:tw--left-4

div.div: "I believe in BALANCE. Life is too short to be STRICT on yourself. I want you to feel your BEST without the fuss."

div.class: field__item tw-mt-4 tw-pl-6 tw-relative tw-text-left tw-font-sans tw-text-4xs sm:tw-text-3xs xl:tw-text-xs tw-tracking-widest tw-uppercase
tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: MetaboliseMe is built on a smart blend of plant-based ingredients, each chosen to support key aspects of metabolic health – from managing blood sugar to curbing appetite and maintaining steady energy levels. At its core is glucomannan, a natural fibre from the konjac root, known for its ability to promote satiety and help reduce the temptation to snack between meals. Joining it is Reducose®, a mulberry leaf extract that works by slowing the body’s absorption of sugars and carbohydrates – a subtle but effective way to smooth out post-meal blood sugar swings. Inulin, a gut-nourishing prebiotic, brings digestive health into the mix, while chromium supports normal blood sugar function and helps the body make better use of insulin. Rounded out with a natural lemon flavour and a hint of stevia sweetness, it’s a food-first formula designed to work with your body.

div.class: tw-space-y-10 md:tw-space-y-16 md:tw-self-start md:tw-sticky md:tw-top-24 lg:tw-top-36 layout__region md:tw-col-span-6 layout__region--second tw-order-first md:tw-order-none
section-margin-wide vertical-align-top section-width-narrow tw-mb-20 lg:tw-mb-28 tw-items-top tw-container md:tw-max-w-lg lg:tw-max-w-2xl xl:tw-max-w-3xl layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: What sets MetaboliseMe apart is the way its ingredients come together. Glucomannan does more than just take up space in your stomach – when taken with water, it gently expands to promote a lasting feeling of fullness, which can naturally reduce the urge to graze. Reducose® has been gaining attention as a next-gen ingredient for blood sugar balance, helping slow the digestion of carbs without the need to overhaul the diet. Inulin lends additional support by feeding beneficial gut bacteria – a crucial but often overlooked part of metabolic health – while chromium fine-tunes the body’s insulin response, helping maintain more consistent energy. Together, they form a multitasking blend that works steadily in the background, supporting your metabolism in a way that feels both natural and sustainable.

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: One sachet of MetaboliseMe a day is all it takes. Mix with water – ideally around 30 minutes before your main meal – and let the active ingredients do the work. For enhanced metabolism support, you can take up to three sachets daily. With a refreshing lemon flavour, it’s a simple addition to your routine, and doesn’t require juggling multiple capsules or supplement bottles.

div.class: section-margin-wide vertical-align-top section-width-normal tw-mb-20 lg:tw-mb-28 tw-items-top tw-container layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
section-margin-wide vertical-align-top section-width-narrow tw-mb-20 lg:tw-mb-28 tw-items-top tw-container md:tw-max-w-lg lg:tw-max-w-2xl xl:tw-max-w-3xl layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Those who’ve added MetaboliseMe to their routine report feeling more satiated after meals, less prone to snacking and more energised throughout the day. Without the ups and downs that come with erratic blood sugar, many experience a greater sense of balance – physically and mentally. It’s not about rapid weight loss or quick fixes, but about supporting your body in working more efficiently – and helping you feel your best from the inside out.

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: If your metabolism feels sluggish, you’re constantly craving sugar, or your energy levels are all over the place, MetaboliseMe could be the gentle support your body’s been missing. It’s a smart choice for anyone looking to optimise their metabolism in a sustainable way – especially helpful during life phases like perimenopause, when shifts in hormones and energy can feel particularly noticeable.

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Metabolic health underpins so much of how we feel – from how clearly we think to how well we sleep and how stable our mood and appetite feel. MetaboliseMe is a thoughtful, well-formulated supplement that supports these systems in a gentle, effective way. If you’re looking for a modern supplement that goes beyond bold claims and actually delivers – this one’s worth trying.

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.h2: Plus, Don’t Miss This Exclusive Offer
div.p: Use the code ME25 for 25% off MetaboliseMe. This offer can be used for one or more packs and subscriptions of MetaboliseMe. £26.25 per pack (usual price £35) or starting from £23.25 on subscription (usual price £31). Visit GP Nutrition using ME25 at checkout.*
You can also call on freephone 0808 502 0505 with the code ME25. Our award-winning Customer Care Team is available 9am to 5pm, Monday to Saturday.

item.title: The Summer Event To Book Right Now
item.partnership: Created in partnership with CHESTERTONS POLO IN THE PARK
item.summary: Chestertons Polo in the Park returns to Hurlingham Park on Friday 6th to Sunday 8th June. The world's largest three-day polo festival always kicks off the capital’s summer social season – so here’s everything you need to know about it, including its new tropical hospitality experience, plus how to join the team at the Ladies Day presented by SheerLuxe…

div.class: layout layout--twocol-section layout--twocol-section--50-50 section-margin-normal sticky-region-left vertical-align-top section-width-normal sheerluxe-grid-gap--x sheerluxe-grid-gap--y tw-mb-20 tw-items-top tw-container tw-grid md:tw-grid-cols-12
tw-space-y-10 md:tw-space-y-16 md:tw-self-start md:tw-sticky md:tw-top-24 lg:tw-top-36 layout__region md:tw-col-span-6 layout__region--first
block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Chestertons Polo in the Park is back – and once again SheerLuxe is hosting the Ladies Day on the Saturday. Held at Hurlingham Park – the spiritual home of polo – from Friday 6th to Sunday 8th June this year, the festival marks the beginning of the capital’s summer social season. International Friday kicks off with England vs. Argentina and will be sponsored by Northern Data Group and presented by CITY A.M., while Ladies Day will be presented by SheerLuxe and SLMan. Plus, there’s the exciting Finals and Family Day on Sunday.

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Chestertons Polo in the Park is the biggest three-day polo event in the world. Hurlingham Park has been considered the home of polo since 1875, when the Hurlingham Polo Committee drew up the first formal rules of the game. In the 150 years since the first game of polo was played in the UK, it’s grown into a much-loved sport, which typically draws an international crowd of both beginners and seasoned fans.

Polo is now played in 77 countries, from the US, Central and South America and the Caribbean, to Europe, the Middle East, India, South-East Asia, China, Australia and New Zealand. The round-robin style tournament is played under the HPA-endorsed City Polo rules, developed to maximise spectator enjoyment – effectively the ‘Twenty20’ of polo – making it easy for newcomers and families to get in on the action.

div.class: section-margin-normal vertical-align-top section-width-narrow tw-mb-20 tw-items-top tw-container md:tw-max-w-lg lg:tw-max-w-2xl xl:tw-max-w-3xl layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item
div.h2: the LADIES DAY PRESENTED BY SHEERLUXE

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: The SheerLuxe-sponsored event will host six city teams competing across the weekend. Guests will enjoy live music, DJs, a luxury shopping village and lovely gardens and bars created by the likes of CALA, plus the chance to be photographed by the SheerLuxe social team. We’ll see you there…

div.class: tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: The three-day event features premier polo teams from around the world, as well as VIP hospitality. Sunday’s Family Day is great for children – in fact, the event bills itself as hosting London’s ‘biggest kids’ party’. Elsewhere, the Fulham Food Festival is a big draw and will feature some of London’s most popular restaurants and artisans – with options ranging from vegan hotspots to gourmet street food. Our picks? The dishes at Bluebird, Made of Dough and Calamari Canteen.

div.class: section-margin-normal vertical-align-middle section-width-full-bleed tw-mb-20 tw-items-center tw-max-w-screen-5xl tw-mx-auto layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
section-margin-normal vertical-align-top section-width-narrow tw-mb-20 tw-items-top tw-container md:tw-max-w-lg lg:tw-max-w-2xl xl:tw-max-w-3xl layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative
tw-max-w-none tw-leading-tight tw-prose tw-max-w-none field field--name-field-title field--type-string field--label-hidden field__item

span.class: tw-bg-black tw-inline-block tw-h-px tw-mb-2 tw-w-[60px] tw-mt-1.5

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: Checkout The Chukka Club, where guests will enjoy access to a reserved area with tables and seating, alongside a bespoke drinks package, food tokens for Fulham Food Festival, and access to a private bar and bathrooms, while also offering shelter from the sunshine when needed. Prices for Chukka Club start from £150 for Sunday tickets, £174 for Saturday tickets, and £345 for Friday tickets. You can find out more about this new experience here.

p.em: Hurlingham Club, 17 Broomhouse Lane, Fulham, SW6 3DP; Friday 6th-Sunday 8th June
Use code SHEERLUXEPOLO for £5 OFF tickets. To book & find out more information, visit

item.title: 3 Ways To Style A White Maxi Skirt
item.summary: A white maxi skirt is a versatile summer staple – and this season, the high street has a great selection of them. Here, we’ve styled three of our favourite pieces in three chic ways, from a low-key casual outfit to an effortless evening look…

div.class: section-margin-normal vertical-align-top section-width-narrow tw-mb-20 tw-items-top tw-container md:tw-max-w-lg lg:tw-max-w-2xl xl:tw-max-w-3xl layout layout--layout-onecol tw-relative

div.class: block block-layout-builder block-inline-blockformatted-text tw-relative tw-prose tw-max-w-none
div.p: For effortless off-duty style, start with the white maxi from Dissh – its relaxed shape is ideal for easy summer days. Add a pretty crochet top from Massimo Dutti, classic leather flip flops, and a raffia clutch from COS for a laid-back yet elevated feel.

div.p: Tapping into a relaxed preppy aesthetic, this look teams the white maxi with a simple grey vest, soft yellow cashmere from Lisa Yang, and boat shoes. It’s fresh, refined, and perfect for casual days that still call for a bit of polish.

div.p: For something a little sharper, try a pleated white maxi from Hush with a structured brown waistcoat from COS. Zebra-print mules add a cool twist, while burgundy accessories tie it all together with a touch of depth and warmth.
